title: #350: Hitting the Iceberg
description:
Vanderpump is on a roll this season. Stress binges, douche firings and blouse poppings galore. We also check in on RHOA and Below Deck. Enjoy! Subscribe at http://www.patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens for bonus episodes, ringtones, and live group video chat parties. Timestamps: 0 Intro and Vanderpump Rules 1:04:00 RHOA 1:22:10 Below Deck
